title: Issho ni H Shiyo
synopsis: Your childhood friend has no place to spend the night. She asks you if she could stay at your place. You obviously agree. She comes a little drunk and upon seeing that you have no girlfriend and fap only to hentai (tissues), she decides to make you a man.
